sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css'; import calculateAvgRating from '../../utils/avgRating'; const TourCard = ({ tour }) => { const { id, title, city, photo, price, featured, reviews } = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating } = cal return (
{featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated' ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )}
{title}
${price} /per person
Book Now
) } export default TourCard
